revised_title: Catalogue of One Thousand New Nebulae and Clusters of Stars: Observations and Instrumentation
tldr: In this article, William Herschel describes his observations and cataloging of one thousand new nebulae and clusters of stars, detailing the telescope and observational techniques used throughout his research. He also discusses the improvements made to his instruments and methods over time, resulting in more accurate determinations of celestial objects' positions.
